title: Strong random generation
summary: Get the platform's strongest SecureRandom implementation.
explanation: getInstanceStrong() returns the SecureRandom implementation configured as the strongest on the platform. This is controlled by the securerandom.strongAlgorithms security property.

whyModernWins.title: Strongest available
whyModernWins.desc: Automatically selects the best algorithm for the platform.

whyModernWins.title: Explicit intent
whyModernWins.desc: Clearly communicates that strong randomness is required.

whyModernWins.title: Configurable
whyModernWins.desc: Administrators can change the strong algorithm via security properties.
